description: It's hurting my eyes.
I'm floored that more people don't want/need a better address-book solution. This is it. Thank you so much!
summary: works, and looks great. Thank you!

description: We need more free contact management options (CardDAV, Nextcloud, etc) not promoting some companies propietary services which gather sensitive information about people.

1. Very good looking App. 
2. Loading time is very high but I can understand the reasson. It fetches updates while it loads 
3. Copy paste do not work in fields that is making it very unprodcutive
4. No choice to add other social networks except Twitter.
flutter is awesome

Just like with Flutter demo showcase app, this app is buggy too. Right after opening the app, window appears containing something like screenshot of windows underneath :D using latest ubuntu with latest kernel.

Not sure if it is specific to Wayland at this point - I'll try it under XOrg.
However under my install in a vanilla gnome session on Ubuntu 20.x LTS, Flokk opens, but shows one blank window - My dock indicator is showing two windows open, with just the one visible. There doesn't appear to be a window hiding behind the main one (I looked).
If it works fine under XOrg I'll update my post.
cannot run in full screen only windowed and it does not fit in low res laptop displays
summary: Looks good but not ideal for hd ready display laptops

description: Blank window and then mouse and everything freezes on XPS13 with Ubuntu 20.04
summary: Locks up my machine proper on start

description:
pros: pretty
cons: it doesnt help in managing contacts in any way, if you want to use it you would have to manually edit every contact by using other programs or copying and pasting the information one by one

nice idea, pretty but useless
This application looks very good but one problem only google contacts can be used with this app.
Can't ctrl-v to paste in the application.
summary: Great and simple but has some quirks

description: empty gui on debian buster
Dare I say, this may be a better Twitter client than Twitter itself.
Why no maximize button on Ubuntu 20.04? Otherwise the UI is great

I am not a fan of the apparence of the app with so much wasted screen real estate. The fact there is no preferences to adjust any of the dispkllay does not help. But the most annoying thing is that you cannot use copy paste when editing contacts. Somebody send me his phone number, I have to manually type it in because you cannot paste anything in the filds. Very frustrating as you can tell from this comment. Unexcusable if you ask me.. if you do not support copy/paste, just go back to storing pho0ne numbers on paper.
summary: cant even use copy paste when editing contact phone numbers

description:
looks nice. i think flutter is great. good to see flutter 2 release with production ready web and desktop on the way.

but crashes anytime i try to search contacts. and other random times to
Eine Funktion zum Kontakte importieren / exportieren wäre noch hilfreich.
C'est une application trés utile pour organiser les contacts google sur son ordinateur sous ubuntu.
It's not bad for an examle program.
